title: Lulu Frost Watch Face
summary: Turn your smartwatch into a golden timepiece with the Lulu Frost watch face.
description: Lulu Frost reimagines tick-tock into bling-bling. Made out of digital jewels inspired by salvaged room numbers from NYC's famed Plaza Hotel, your time has never been told in a brighter way. This all against a smooth backdrop that gradually changes from day to night.
descriptionHTML: Lulu Frost reimagines tick-tock into bling-bling. Made out of digital jewels inspired by salvaged room numbers from NYC's famed Plaza Hotel, your time has never been told in a brighter way. This all against a smooth backdrop that gradually changes from day to night.
comments: OMG it is beautiful on my watch. I love it. Could not find at first but I had to go in my watch in the play store and download. Gorgeous thank you
Wish it had a few more faces, but really love it all the same.
Downloaded the app but can't find it to put on my watch face.
I love it!!! Nice picture easy to use
